item.title: Automount
Deploying Hugo in Github Page
item.description: Example System Specs * OS: Arch Linux ARM 32bit * WM: bspwm * Browser: surf * Text Editor: vim * Github username: user * Github repo name: mysite Adapt the commands below to your own system. Installation & Setup # install Hugo site generator sudo pacman -S hugo # verify installation hugo version # make skeleton site & setup git repo mkdir -p ~/sites/ cd ~/sites hugo new site mysite cd mysite From now on, unless otherwise notice, we always assume pwd=~/sites/mysite/, i.
